channel.title: Feedly on JNyman.com
channel.description: Recent content in Feedly on JNyman.com

item.title: A Distributed & Robust Feedly
item.description: In light of the recent attack on Feedly.com I thought it might be interesting to see other ways we could propogate data accross the Interent without being succeptible to attacks, or, at least less accessible. With the approach outlined below we need to use an actual app instead of being able to use a browser (there might be a way to use a browser also, not sure how it would work though).
